content.html: I realized recently that the bulk of my time as a developer is spent on research - if I've done the right research, typing out the code is the least time consuming part of the whole thing So care most about DX efforts that help me there - great docs, great examples, great demos
content.value:
I realized recently that the bulk of my time as a developer is spent on research - if I've done the right research, typing  out the code is the least time consuming part of the whole thing

So care most about DX efforts that help me there - great docs, great examples, great demos
